casebody.data:
Bertrand J. CHAROULEAU, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 14686. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. Jan. 12, 1954. Bertrand J. Charouleau, in pro. per. Richard C. Baldwin, Asst. U. S. Atty., New Orleans, La., for appellee.

Before HUTCHESON, Chief Judge, and HOLMES and RIVES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on authority of Beland v. U. S., 5 Cir., 128 F.2d 795, 797; Gryger v. Burke, 334 U.S. 728, 732, 68 S.Ct. 1256, 92 L.Ed. 1683, and cases there cited.
